Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory698.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: "Crimson particles gather in Alpha's left hand, linking together her consciousness and Lucia's."}
{1: '1', 3: "The noises in Lucia's M.I.N.D. gradually lowered, along with her level of infection."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Were you trying to release your power and find a way to contain it through the battle just now?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Did you notice that?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "We fought so many times. Of course I can tell if there's something wrong with you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Stop pretending that you understand me... But you were right.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Why did you do that?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "That's the only way to buy more time.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'You are right. The Ascension-Network is our common enemy now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'If we really fought to death, that would be just what it wanted.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Are you suggesting that this is also part of the filtering? That we can sense each other's whereabouts?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What exactly is filtering?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: '...Some things can only be understood when you connect to the Ascension-Network. Do you want to become an Ascendant?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lucia shakes her head.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Then stop asking.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Come with me. I accept your offer for now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'You can still regret it now. I mean, if anyone sees you with me, your Gray Raven will be in trouble.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'It has nothing to do with Commandant and others. I testified before I came here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Hah, relax. The place we are going is still a secret.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Maybe they would panic more with that being exposed. Who knows?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...What exactly have you been investigating?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'The North Asian Research Institute of Life Science and Evolution. It has another more common name, Fort Winter.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "It's the most secret lab Kurono was hiding from the world. You will also find the records about the Project Winter that you have been tracing.", 4: '2'}
